name: DJ Max Fever
overview: Based on the second edition of the Korean music sensation (but mixing elements of all editions), DJ Max Fever for PSP features a brand new mix of music tracks, a re-balanced difficulty curve, new visual elements and more! The title packs in more than 100 songs for you to tap through, as well as a Freestyle Mode (that's activated by performing a perfect mix), goal-based contests called Extreme challenges, five difficulty levels, Network Battle Mode and a collection gallery to house the music videos, soundtracks, and images you unlock.
